sentences.en: Beck's Mercedes, with its large diplomatic medallion on the radiator drove up the wharf and stopped.
sentences.cn: 贝克的梅西德斯轿车的水箱上有个很大的外交标记,车到码头上就停住了.

sentences.en: He tooled me down to the wharf.
Huck was already upon his watch when the ferry - boat's lights went glinting past the wharf.
sentences.cn: 渡船的灯光一摇一闪从码头边经过时,哈克已经开始守夜了.

sentences.en: Our ship is on to the wharf.
Silent, they loafed on the edge of the wharf, swinging their legs above the water.
sentences.cn: 他们悄悄地坐在码头边上消磨时光, 两腿在水面上来回晃荡.

sentences.en: The boat floated into the wharf to which it belonged.
sentences.cn: 船驶入它所隶属的码头.

sentences.en: The boat thumped against the wharf.
The boatmen boomed the boat off the wharf.
sentences.cn: 船夫用竿把船推离码头。

sentences.en: The crowd that throngs the wharf as the steamer draws alongside is gay and debonair.
sentences.cn: 当轮船靠近码头时,蜂拥到岸边的人群兴高采烈而又彬彬有礼.

sentences.en: The pillars of the wharf are still sticking up in the water.
sentences.cn: 码头的桩子仍在水中竖立着.

sentences.en: The ship lies alongside the wharf.
The ship lies alongside the wharf.; The steamer lies at the pier.
The ship was nearing the wharf.
They are waiting for us on the wharf.
sentences.cn: 他们正在码头上等着我们.

sentences.en: We fetch up at the wharf exactly on time.
We reached the wharf gasping for breath.
sentences.cn: 我们气喘吁吁地抵达了码头。

sentences.en: We walked her to the wharf and put her aboard the ship.
sentences.cn: 我们陪她走到码头,将她安顿到船上.

sentences.en: When they got out of the rickshaws at the wharf, Fang and Miss Pao lingered behind.
sentences.cn: 到码头下车, 方鸿渐和鲍小姐落在后面.

words.tran_cn: 使靠码头；为…建码头；把货卸在码头上

phrases.tran_cn: n. 渔人码头（美国旧金山旅游观光名胜）
码头岸肩；自码头货棚至水边间的空间

trans.tran_en: a structure that is built out into the water so that boats can stop next to it

trans.tran_cn: 使靠码头；为…建码头；把货卸在码头上
